– Drop and match juicy fruits.
– Merge them to grow bigger fruits.
– Keep merging until you unlock the ultimate mega watermelon!
Perfect for:

Challenge your friends, master the merge, and discover the secret to the juiciest watermelon! Download Watermelon Up: Juicy Fruit Drop today and join the fruity fun!
